question: Question_03_(b)
statement:
\emph{In this question you will state and then apply the Mean Value
Theorem.}

What does the Mean Value Theorem tell us about the function
$f(x) = \sin x$ on the interval \emph{{[}0,b{]}}, where \emph{b} is any
positive number?
hints:
Does $\sin x$ satisfy the conditions of the Mean Value Theorem on the
interval $[0,b]$? What conclusion can you draw?
